# Airbnb London - WEEK 5 demo

library(sf)

## read data
```{r}
Londonborough <- st_read("wk1/london_borough/data/statistical-gis-boundaries-london/ESRI/London_Borough_Excluding_MHW.shp") %>% st_transform(.,27700)

OSM <- st_read("wk5/data/greater-london-latest-free.shp/gis_osm_pois_free_1.shp") %>% 
  st_transform(.,27700) %>% 
  # select hotel only
  dplyr::filter(fclass == 'hotel')
```
